issue.title: ignition-gazebo major version is hard-coded in plugin filenames in sdf files

content.raw:
>  the lib name would be different from the target name

Good point! We would need to modify the library name instead of letting it be automatically assigned.

> I'm not sure if this would be a good idea.

I don't see anything wrong with that at all, especially if it's going to be installed into a versioned directory. CMake is perfectly happy to have library targets produce an `.so` file with a name that's different from the target name.
